mapper.sql: id AS "id", turnover_id AS "turnoverId", lattice_code AS "latticeCode", goods_type AS "goodsType", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_id AS "materialId", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", m_unit AS "mUnit", material_serial_number AS "materialSerialNumber", m_batch AS "mBatch", m_number AS "mNumber", create_time AS "createTime",lattice_state AS "latticeState"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id = #{paramCondition.id}
and turnover_id = #{paramCondition.turnoverId}
and lattice_code like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeCode},'%')
and goods_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.goodsType},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_id = #{paramCondition.materialId}
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and lattice_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeState},'%')

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and lattice_code like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeCode},'%')

and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and lattice_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeState},'%')

from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1

and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and lattice_code like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeCode},'%')

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1 and turnover_id = #{paramCondition.turnoverId} limit 1

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1 and turnover_id = #{paramCondition.turnoverId}

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1 and turnover_id = #{paramCondition.id}
select from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1=1 and material_sku = #{materialSku} order by id asc limit 1;

select * from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind AS wmb LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse_turnover AS wm ON wmb.`turnover_id` = wm.`id` where wm.`turnover_state` = '0' and wm.turnover_type = #{paramCondition.turnoverType} and wm.turnover_mouth_quantity = #{paramCondition.turnoverLatticeType}
select * from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1=1 and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{materialSerialNumber},'%')
